 ## Importar al dataset

```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```

### Visualizaci√≥n en Altair

```{python}

alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Name",
    tooltip=["Name", "Origin", "Miles_per_Gallon", 
    "Horsepower"]
).interactive()

#interactive: zoom, brush
```
